page.shortlink: Add Alternative Login to Current User
page.topic: Add Alternative Login to Current User
page.description: Add account credentials for an alternative login provider such as Google.

discussion.p: Alternative logins allow users to login to an application through a different account; such as a Google, Facebook, LinkedIn, or Twitter account. When an *[ui:Add Alternative Login to Current User]* action is defined, in addition to an authentication provider a list is also required. If you add a login for a different provider it this list control will be updated to show the change.
For more on how to implement Alternative Login, watch the videos below. Skip to "Part 4 - Adding to the UX Component" for information about the *[ui:Add Alternative Login to Current User]* action.
